the woods

2001-11-03

i went camping last night, semi-spontaneous beauty, campfire made and danced around in my head, really mesmerized and frozen staring into the licking flames, slept like a rock and woke up thinking i was in my bed, hiked through a beautiful place, simulation w. nc mountains
